name: grapejuice
label: New maps, New atlas templates, New Skirmish Randomization, Rebalance, New particles, New Building, New Tech
description: 2 new maps. The mod adds player position randomnization for skirmish maps. Reworked some particles and added others. Some units have been rebalanced (mostly archer units). New building + new tech, Field Camp. Reworked priests.
